thread.title: Kurt Russell saddles up for 'Bone Tomahawk,' 'Hateful Eight'
thread.title_full: Kurt Russell saddles up for 'Bone Tomahawk,' 'Hateful Eight'

title: Kurt Russell saddles up for 'Bone Tomahawk,' 'Hateful Eight'
text:
> Entertainment Kurt Russell saddles up for 'Bone Tomahawk,''Hateful Eight' This photo provided by Twilight Riders, LLC shows, Richard Jenkins, left, as Chicory and Kurt Russell as Sheriff Franklin Hunt in the western film “Bone Tomahawk,” an RLJ Entertainment release. The movie opens in U.S. theaters Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. (Scott Everett White/Twilight Riders, LLC via AP)
